roleset.name: orientation of an entity: straight up and down

example.name: vertical-j
example.text: this one is all in one vertical plane
example.amr: (b / be-located-at-91 :ARG1 (o / one :mod (t / this) :mod (a / all)) :ARG2 (p / plane :quant 1 :ARG1-of (v / vertical-01 :ARG2 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b2 / build-space)))))

roleset.note: VERTICAL NOTES: Updataed for SpatialAMR. Arg3 added (AXS, pragmatic role). Vertical.02 has been Split off from this sense, although actual corpus instances are rare and unlikely to have come up much.
VERTICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-Temprl1to8. (from vertical.01-j)

roleset.name: relationship between the locations of 2 entities: a line between one entity and another entity is vertical

role.descr: entity located along a vertical line
other entity located along the vertical line

example.name: vertical-j: arg1
example.text: Patient states he thinks vision has improved , but , he is still getting double vision that is not vertical , or horizontal in nature , but , seems diagonal .
example.amr: (s / state-01 :ARG0 (p / patient-yy) :ARG1 (t / think-01 :ARG0 p :ARG1 (i2 / improve-01 :ARG1 (s2 / see-01 :ARG0 p)) :concession (g / get-01 :ARG0 p :ARG1 (s4 / sign-symptom :name (n / name :op1 "double" :op2 "vision") :poss-of (n3 / nature :ARG4-of (d / diagonal-01 :ARG1-of (s5 / seem-01) :ARG1-of (i3 / instead-of-91 :ARG2 (o / or :op1 (v / vertical-02 :ARG4 n3) :op2 (h / horizontal-02 :ARG4 n3)))))) :mod (s3 / still))))

example.name: vertical-j: both args
example.text: the sun is vertical to the north part of the channel of Mozambique ;

propbank.arg: to the north part of the channel of Mozambique

example.amr: (v / vertical-02 :ARG1 (s / sun) :ARG2 (p / part :ARG1-of (n / north-02 :ARG3 (c2 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (g / geographic-pole))) :part-of (c / channel :name (n2 / name :op1 "Channel" :op2 "of" :op3 "Mozambique"))) :ARG3 (c3 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (c4 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (e / environment))))

roleset.note: VERTICAL NOTES: Added for SpatialAMR. Split off from vertical-01, although instances of this sense are rare.
